about_the_game:
Race Day Car Pack features 8, new-to-Forza cars built exclusively for the racetrack including high-performance machines like the 2018 Acura #36 NSX GT3 and the 2017 Vauxhall #66 Power Maxed TAG Racing Astra. Collect, build and race these powerful track legends of motorsport from day one.*

Race Day Car Pack is included with Premium Edition and the Premium Add-Ons Bundle.

*Requires game, sold separately.
detailed_description:
Race Day Car Pack features 8, new-to-Forza cars built exclusively for the racetrack including high-performance machines like the 2018 Acura #36 NSX GT3 and the 2017 Vauxhall #66 Power Maxed TAG Racing Astra. Collect, build and race these powerful track legends of motorsport from day one.*

Race Day Car Pack is included with Premium Edition and the Premium Add-Ons Bundle.

*Requires game, sold separately.
